summary.Title: Bicycle Mechanic
summary.Presentation: Bike Brothers are the bicycle market leader in Rogaland with a total of 4 shops and at the moment we have 25 employees working in sales and workshops.We are mainly selling our own brand, BROS

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Bike Brothers are the bicycle market leader in Rogaland with a total of 4 shops and at the moment we have 25 employees working in sales and workshops.
We are mainly selling our own brand, BROS. In addition we stock brands such as Kalkhoff, Focus, Specialized, Cannondale among others.
In addition to these brands, our workshops handle all kind of brands and types of bikes, also ebikes.
We want to hire bike mechanics that mainly will work in the workshop with all types of bike services.

Job description 
Reperation and maintance of various types of bicycles.
We have road bikes, mountain bikes, hybrids and e-bikes, from our own brand and from other brands.
We are looking for two season workers, approximately from 1.4.2022 till 1.10.2022
We all set pride in our work, and it is important that you do the same.
So if you like bikes, working with bikes this could be a perfect opportunity to explore the magnificent western coast of Norway.


Skills:
Education, work experience, language, certificate etc. We are only seeking qualified and experienced bicycle mechanics.
It is essential that you have minimum 3 years experience, and can work independently from day one. You will be given help and support on special brands and systems.
Scandinavian language skills would be perfect, but fluent English is a minimum.


Working hours and place of work Working place would be in Norway and more specific in Rogaland, at one of our locations in the Stavanger area. You will be working in varying shifts during our opening hours from 09:00 until 19:00.
You will have to work every second weekend and a average of 37,5 hours per week.

We will be helpful finding a place to live in Norway, and you will be part of a good crew.

Application
Last application day 1.6.2022
How to apply?  Please send you application and CV via email
Contact person/ telephone number Kristian Fløysvik 930 64 167
E-mail kristian@bikebrothers.no
